forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally cloudy. High 17C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 63F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then off and on rain showers overnight. Low 12C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 53F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 59F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 48F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning light rain. High 14C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 46F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 18C. ENE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 64F. ENE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 9C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 48F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 21C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 69F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 51F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 18C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 64F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies with a few showers late. Low around 10C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies with a few showers late. Low around 50F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 61F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 10C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 50F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 18C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High around 65F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 11C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 52F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 22C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 72F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.
